Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in Android Development. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to develop a calculator app for an android device.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a simple android program using the questions and answers above. The program should be in the JAVA programming language.

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used to perform mathematical calculations.

QApair.Question: What type of calculations will the calculator app be used for?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

QApair.Question: What is the range of numbers that the calculator app will be able to calculate?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be able to calculate numbers from 1 to 999999.

QApair.Question: What is the format that the calculator app will use to display the results of the calculations?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will use a standard format to display the results of the calculations.

QApair.Question: Are there any special features that the calculator app will have?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will have a memory function that will allow the user to save the results of their calculations and it also handles special edge cases like division by zero.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app is designed for people who need to perform basic mathematical calculations.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the app?
QApair.Answer: The name of the app is "Simple Calculator."

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used to perform higher mathematics calculations.

QApair.Question: What type of calculations will the calculator app be used for?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used for squaring, cubing, exponential calculations, and square rooting.

QApair.Question: What is the range of numbers that the calculator app will be able to calculate?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be able to calculate numbers from 1 to 9999.

QApair.Question: What is the format that the calculator app will use to display the results of the calculations?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will use a standard format to display the results of the calculations.

QApair.Question: Are there any special features that the calculator app will have?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will have a memory function that will allow the user to save the results of their calculations and it also handles special edge cases of square rooting and exponential equations.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app is designed for people who need to perform higher mathematical calculations.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the app?
QApair.Answer: The name of the app is "Higher Calculator."

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used to perform complex number calculations.

QApair.Question: What type of calculations will the calculator app be used for?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be used for addition and subtraction of complex numbers.

QApair.Question: What is the range of numbers that the calculator app will be able to calculate?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will be able to calculate all complex numbers.

QApair.Question: What is the format that the calculator app will use to display the results of the calculations?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will use a standard complex number format to display the results of the calculations.

QApair.Question: Are there any special features that the calculator app will have?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app will have a memory function that will allow the user to save the results of their calculations.

QApair.Question: What is the target audience for the calculator app?
QApair.Answer: The calculator app is designed for people who need to perform basic complex number mathematical calculations.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the app?
QApair.Answer: The name of the app is "Complex Calculator."
